verses.text: If \w there|strong="H4480"\w* arise \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* midst \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* prophet, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dreamer \w of|strong="H1697"\w* dreams, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w give|strong="H6680"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sign \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wonder,

\w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sign|strong="H4159"\w* \w or|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wonder|strong="H4159"\w* \w come|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w pass|strong="H6965"\w*, whereof \w he|strong="H3588"\w* spake \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w*, saying, \w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w go|strong="H6965"\w* \w after|strong="H3588"\w* other gods, \w which|strong="H5030"\w* \w thou|strong="H5414"\w* hast \w not|strong="H5414"\w* known, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* serve \w them|strong="H5414"\w*;

\w thou|strong="H3045"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hearken \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* words \w of|strong="H5647"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w prophet|strong="H1696"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* dreamer \w of|strong="H5647"\w* dreams: \w for|strong="H3045"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* proveth \w you|strong="H3045"\w*, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w whether|strong="H3045"\w* \w ye|strong="H3045"\w* love \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* heart \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* soul.

\w Ye|strong="H3426"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* walk \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fear \w him|strong="H1931"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w commandments|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* voice, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w ye|strong="H3426"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* serve \w him|strong="H1931"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* cleave \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* prophet, \w or|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* dreamer \w of|strong="H3068"\w* dreams, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* death, \w because|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H8085"\w* rebellion \w against|strong="H3212"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H5647"\w* \w out|strong="H3212"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Egypt, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* redeemed \w thee|strong="H5647"\w* \w out|strong="H3212"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* house \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w bondage|strong="H5647"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* draw \w thee|strong="H5647"\w* aside \w out|strong="H3212"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w way|strong="H3212"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H4687"\w* \w thee|strong="H5647"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w*. \w So|strong="H8085"\w* shalt \w thou|strong="H8085"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w away|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* evil \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thee|strong="H5647"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* brother, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* mother, \w or|strong="H4480"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* son, \w or|strong="H4480"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1004"\w*, \w or|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wife|strong="H1696"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* bosom, \w or|strong="H4480"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* friend, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* thine own soul, entice \w thee|strong="H6680"\w* secretly, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*, \w Let|strong="H3212"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* serve other gods, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* hast \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w known|strong="H3318"\w*, \w thou|strong="H3588"\w*, \w nor|strong="H4480"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* fathers;

\w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* gods \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* peoples \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w round|strong="H3212"\w* \w about|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, nigh \w unto|strong="H3212"\w* \w thee|strong="H5647"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w far|strong="H5315"\w* \w off|strong="H7453"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w thee|strong="H5647"\w*, \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* end \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w unto|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w other|strong="H7453"\w* end \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth;

\w thou|strong="H5704"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H5971"\w* consent \w unto|strong="H5971"\w* \w him|strong="H5439"\w*, \w nor|strong="H4480"\w* hearken \w unto|strong="H5971"\w* \w him|strong="H5439"\w*; \w neither|strong="H4480"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* thine eye pity \w him|strong="H5439"\w*, \w neither|strong="H4480"\w* shalt \w thou|strong="H5704"\w* spare, \w neither|strong="H4480"\w* shalt \w thou|strong="H5704"\w* conceal \w him|strong="H5439"\w*:

\w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w thou|strong="H8085"\w* shalt \w surely|strong="H8085"\w* kill \w him|strong="H5921"\w*; \w thy|strong="H8085"\w* hand \w shall|strong="H5869"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* first \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* put \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* death, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* afterward \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hand \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* shalt stone \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w with|strong="H5971"\w* stones, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w hath|strong="H3027"\w* sought \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w draw|strong="H5971"\w* \w thee|strong="H3027"\w* \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H2026"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w thee|strong="H3027"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Egypt, \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* house \w of|strong="H3027"\w* bondage.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* Israel \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* hear, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fear, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* no \w more|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H3588"\w* such wickedness \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* midst \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w thee|strong="H1245"\w*.

If \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* shalt \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w tell|strong="H8085"\w* \w concerning|strong="H1697"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w thy|strong="H8085"\w* cities, \w which|strong="H1697"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w giveth|strong="H1697"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* dwell \w there|strong="H2088"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

\w Certain|strong="H8085"\w* base fellows \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w gone|strong="H3068"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* drawn \w away|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, saying, \w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* serve other gods, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w ye|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w known|strong="H8085"\w*;

\w then|strong="H3318"\w* shalt \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* inquire, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w make|strong="H3045"\w* search, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* ask diligently; \w and|strong="H1121"\w*, \w behold|strong="H3808"\w*, \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w truth|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* thing \w certain|strong="H3045"\w*, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w such|strong="H3808"\w* abomination \w is|strong="H5892"\w* wrought \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w thee|strong="H5647"\w*,

\w thou|strong="H6213"\w* shalt \w surely|strong="H6213"\w* smite \w the|strong="H6213"\w* inhabitants \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* city \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* edge \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* sword, destroying \w it|strong="H6213"\w* utterly, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w therein|strong="H7130"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* cattle \w thereof|strong="H7130"\w*, \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* edge \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* sword.

\w And|strong="H5892"\w* \w thou|strong="H3427"\w* shalt gather \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* spoil \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w into|strong="H2719"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* street \w thereof|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* shalt burn \w with|strong="H3427"\w* fire \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* spoil \w thereof|strong="H5892"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* whit, \w unto|strong="H5892"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H5221"\w* God: \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* \w be|strong="H5892"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* heap \w forever|strong="H3605"\w*; \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H5892"\w* \w be|strong="H5892"\w* built again.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* cleave \w nought|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* devoted \w thing|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* hand; \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w turn|strong="H6908"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fierceness \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* anger, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w show|strong="H1961"\w* thee \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* compassion \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* multiply thee, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* sworn \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* fathers;

\w when|strong="H7725"\w* \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* shalt hearken \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w keep|strong="H1692"\w* \w all|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* commandments \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w command|strong="H3027"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H5414"\w* day, \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* eyes \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
